lead_paragraph: Ernesto Escobedo, the first Mexican-American man to break into the top 200 since the 1960s, is on a path similar to the Williams sisters’ in its genesis and improbability.

headline.main: Holy Smokes! Israel Takes Step Toward Marijuana Reforms
